summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Grand Boulevard, from the east line of Twenty-fourth Avenue West to the east line of Twenty-sixth Avenue West, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing wooden walks thereon, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 33991; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
